attributes.action: Wanting more dog waste Bins around L25 an L27 areas
attributes.additional_details: Because I think the enforcement of the government will help get the areas cleaner quicker. The residents of L25 an L27 ares are annoyed of the dog fouling progressing more an more and nothink is getting done about it.
attributes.background:
Enforce more fines for dog fouling 
Havnt paid for the fine the rights to take the dog off you.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about the provision of bins for dog waste, and enforcement of fines for failing to dispose of dog waste properly are a matter for the relevant local authority, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

We could accept a petition calling on the Government to increase the penalties for failing to dispose of dog waste, if that's what you want to happen.
